I love… my everything showers 🚿

And you too can achieve the smoothest shave ever in 6 simple steps:

🫧Prep: Dampen skin with warm water to soften hair.
🫧Cleanse: Use body wash to remove dirt and oil.
🫧Exfoliate: Massage your favorite Tree Hut scrub in circular motions to lift hairs and buff away dead skin.
🫧Shave: Apply shave oil for a smooth glide and shave with gentle strokes.
🫧Soothe: Use aftershave serum to hydrate and prevent irritation.
🫧Lock in: Finish with lotion or whipped body butter for soft, glowing skin.
